item.title: Write Once, Test Everywhere: Sharing Common Tests in Python’s unittest
item.description: A while back, I was writing tests for a project using Python’s unittest. Nothing dramatic — just the usual rhythm: write a class, test it, move to the next one. After a few classes, though, the déjà vu hit.
